title: Diamond Kangan - Modern Bangle with Timeless Sparkle
materials: G Color). Features Hyderabadi polish for a lustrous finish.
features: Modern bangle design featuring a continuous wave pattern adorned with meticulously set round brilliant cut diamonds. The wave design adds a touch of fluidity and movement, perfectly complementing the diamonds' brilliance. The rose gold setting enhances the diamonds' sparkle and adds a touch of warmth.
occasions: Perfect for everyday wear or special occasions. A stunning choice for a modern bride
description: This Diamond Kangan is a perfect blend of modern design and timeless elegance. The high-quality diamonds, expertly crafted in rose gold with a signature Hyderabadi polish, ensure lasting beauty and value. It's a versatile piece that will elevate any outfit.
